name: zarc-epp-tester
description: A Node.js EPP client for testing connections to ZARC (.co.za) registry in Operational Test Environment (OTE). This tool helps registrars test their integration with ZARC registry before going live.
author: Jedidiah Solomon

scripts.test:all: npm run test:login && npm run test:contact && npm run test:domain-check && npm run test:domain-create
scripts.preinstall: echo 'Installing dependencies for ZARC EPP Tester...'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Dependencies installed. Run: cp config/zarc-example.env config/zarc.env'
